mapper.select: SELECT a.goods_code, a.goods_name, a.goods_class, a.price, a.iconImg, b.brand, b.firstBrand, b.secondBrand, b.introduce, b.introducePrice, b.introduceUrl, GROUP_CONCAT( c.`code`, '#', c.url, '#', IFNULL(c.isBigImg, '0') ) imglist FROM mg_goods a LEFT JOIN mg_goodsdetails b ON a.goods_code = b.goods_code LEFT JOIN mg_attachment c ON a.goods_code = c.tabCode GROUP BY a.goods_code, a.goods_name, a.goods_class, a.price, a.iconImg, b.brand, b.firstBrand, b.secondBrand, b.introduce, b.introducePrice, b.introduceUrl
